bibl.title: Heteros tis eimi: On the Language of Menander's Young Lovers.
bibl.note: 1. Sostratos and Gorgias in the Dyskolos. - 2. Moschion in the Samia. - 3. Moschion and Polemon in the Perikeiromene. - 4. Thrasonides in the Misoumenos. - 5. Stratophanes and Moschion in the Sikyonios. - 6. Special Criteria: Periods, End-stop and Hyperbaton. - 7. The Young Men of Euripides and Menander Compared. - 8. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Brenk Frederick E., Heteros tis eimi: On the Language of Menander's Young Lovers.
